project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a secure random password based on user-defined specifications.

task.name: Implement logic to generate random uppercase letters
Implement logic to generate random lowercase letters
Implement logic to generate random numbers
Implement logic to generate random special characters
Implement the main function to combine all characters and generate the password
Write tests for the password generation function to ensure it meets requirements
Execute tests on the password generator to validate functionality and randomness
